This is the main wiki page for the CMSI 401 Software Engineering Laboratory course for 2009.  Students should use the wiki for design notes, documents, reports, discussion, and other artifacts related to the course.

The [http://www.cs.lmu.edu/~ray/classes/se course web page] has links to the syllabus and course notes.  This wiki is intended for your coursework, not for dissemination of course announcements and requirements.
